Jacks Brake & Alignment Sponsored JBA Towing has an opening for a tow truck driver to work from home. On average, our guys make around $700 to $1,800 + a week, sometimes more. If you have an interest, please email terry@jbatowing.com. Qualified driver must be mechanically inclined and must be at least 25 years old and meet the following requirements: 1. Possess good and respectful communication skills 2. Displays customer first service 3. Have a strong attention to detail and adequate record keeping skills 4. Have an acceptable driving record for the past 3 years Additionally, qualified candidates must be professional, honest, reliable, and courteous. This position is paid weekly.
